title: 在MC里你一出生会干什么？
txt_content:
你们说，在MC里一出生会先干什么，我呢就是看到树就先敲树！


谈谈自己的意见吧！{:10_492:}！

replies.author: 花钱丶伤
replies.txt_content: 错版。挖树、做镐、升镐、挖矿、杀怪（第一天）

replies.author: 夏之影
replies.txt_content: 找庇护所后撸树

replies.author: 哭泣的格桑花
replies.txt_content: 先破坏~

replies.author: MC大湿
replies.txt_content: 你是为了做任务吧！准备删帖吧

replies.author: wuhuairu
replies.txt_content: 撸lz大水

replies.author: httma
replies.txt_content: 第一天作死

replies.author: 苦力怕的爷爷
replies.txt_content: 我嘛就是找个有猪等动物的地方后打树

replies.author: 银色十字梦
replies.txt_content: 不撸树还干嘛。。

replies.author: Sully_wrn
replies.txt_content: Tons of TNT.

replies.author: zjr_516635864
replies.txt_content: 迈开第一步.
打开背包

replies.author: wu20011116
replies.txt_content: 打泥土。先简便的造个家，，，然后，砍树去。
